body:
hello Bradley, 
 
Just a quick note. I'm a "work at home" marketer and I need 
you to take a look at something I'm doing part time.. 
 
First of all, if we haven't met before, this is me: 
 
Name: Paul Stevenson 
 
Email: paul@psrocks.com 
 
Website: 
 
 
I'm promoting an explosive business opportunity that will literally 
help me retire and give me that financial boost now that I need to really have fun! 
 
It's a one of those rare deals that actually pays out 100% to it's members! 
 
I'd appreciate your thoughts. 
 
Here's a bit of info for you about their payouts: 
 
If you can invite just 1 new person per month, you'll have an annual income of 
over $50,000 within a year's time. That isn't much work for a $10 program :) 
If you and your 1 referral can do the same or more, just think of how much you'll 
be bringing it! 
 
Think about it... 
 
Visit: 
 
It's only $10 per month and you get a full e-marketing suite of products that 
will create multiple streams of income automatically FOR you! 
 
They have an incredible Multi-program auto responder that you can use to 
promote "any" opportunity you want! That feature alone is actually what I joined for. 
It's true "set and forget" technology which frees up a lot of time for me. 
 
Their pay plan pays out in 4 ways including a HUGE 100% matching bonus on all 
your personal referrals, which is where you'll make most of your money. 
 
There's a lot more to tell so please visit my site below and grab your free report 
about "Making outrageous money online." 
 
--> Come and join my team and let's make this fun! 
 
 
Have a Great Day, 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Paul Stevenson 
paul@psrocks.com 
 
Pay your mortgage or rent every month for just $10.75
